00010 using namespace std;
00011 
00012 class ibinstream {
00013 private:
00014     vector<char> buf;
00015 
00016 public:
00017     char* get_buf()
00018     {
00019         return &buf[0];
00020     }
00021 
00022     size_t size()
00023     {
00024         return buf.size();
00025     }
00026 
00027     void raw_byte(char c)
00028     {
00029         buf.push_back(c);
00030     }
00031 
00032     void raw_bytes(const void* ptr, int size)
00033     {
00034         buf.insert(buf.end(), (const char*)ptr, (const char*)ptr + size);
00035     }
00036 };
00037 
00038 ibinstream& operator<<(ibinstream& m, size_t i)
00039 { //unsigned int
00040     m.raw_bytes(&i, sizeof(size_t));
00041     return m;
00042 }
00043 ibinstream& operator<<(ibinstream& m, long long i)
00044 { //unsigned int
00045     m.raw_bytes(&i, sizeof(long long));
00046     return m;
00047 }

00049 {
00050     m.raw_bytes(&i, sizeof(bool));
00051     return m;
00052 }

00057     return m;

00063     return m;

00069     return m;

00072 ibinstream& operator<<(ibinstream& m, char c)
00073 {
00074     m.raw_byte(c);
00075     return m;

00077 
00078 template <class T>
00079 ibinstream& operator<<(ibinstream& m, const T* p)
00080 {
00081     return m << *p;
00082 }
00083 
00084 template <class T>
00085 ibinstream& operator<<(ibinstream& m, const vector<T>& v)
00086 {
00087     m << v.size();
00088     for (typename vector<T>::const_iterator it = v.begin(); it != v.end(); ++it) {
00089         m << *it;
00090     }
00091     return m;
00092 }
00093 
00094 template <class T>
00095 ibinstream& operator<<(ibinstream& m, const set<T>& v)
00096 {
00097     m << v.size();
00098     for (typename set<T>::const_iterator it = v.begin(); it != v.end(); ++it) {
00099         m << *it;
00100     }
00101     return m;
00102 }
00103 
00104 ibinstream& operator<<(ibinstream& m, const string& str)
00105 {
00106     m << str.length();
00107     m.raw_bytes(str.c_str(), str.length());
00108     return m;
00109 }

00111 template <class KeyT, class ValT>
00112 ibinstream& operator<<(ibinstream& m, const pair<KeyT, ValT>& v)
00113 {
00114     m << v.first;
00115     m << v.second;
00116     return m;
00117 }

00121 {
00122     m << v.size();
00123     for (typename map<KeyT, ValT>::const_iterator it = v.begin(); it != v.end(); ++it) {
00124         m << it->first;
00125         m << it->second;
00126     }
00127     return m;

00132 {
00133     m << v.size();
00134     for (typename hash_map<KeyT, ValT>::const_iterator it = v.begin(); it != v.end(); ++it) {
00135         m << it->first;
00136         m << it->second;
00137     }
00138     return m;

00141 template <class T>
00142 ibinstream& operator<<(ibinstream& m, const hash_set<T>& v)
00143 {
00144     m << v.size();
00145     for (typename hash_set<T>::const_iterator it = v.begin(); it != v.end(); ++it) {
00146         m << *it;
00147     }
00148     return m;

00150 
00151 class obinstream {
00152 private:
00153     char* buf; //responsible for deleting the buffer, do not delete outside
00154     size_t size;
00155     size_t index;
00156 
00157 public:
00158     obinstream(char* b, size_t s)
00159         : buf(b)
00160         , size(s)
00161         , index(0) {};
00162     obinstream(char* b, size_t s, size_t idx)
00163         : buf(b)
00164         , size(s)
00165         , index(idx) {};
00166     ~obinstream()
00167     {
00168         delete[] buf;
00169     }
00170 
00171     char raw_byte()
00172     {
00173         return buf[index++];
00174     }
00175 
00176     void* raw_bytes(unsigned int n_bytes)
00177     {
00178         char* ret = buf + index;
00179         index += n_bytes;
00180         return ret;
00181     }
00182 };
00183 
00184 obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, size_t& i)
00185 {
00186     i = *(size_t*)m.raw_bytes(sizeof(size_t));
00187     return m;
00188 }
00189 obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, long long& i)
00190 {
00191     i = *(long long*)m.raw_bytes(sizeof(long long));
00192     return m;
00193 }

00195 {
00196     i = *(bool*)m.raw_bytes(sizeof(bool));
00197     return m;
00198 }

00201 {
00202     i = *(int*)m.raw_bytes(sizeof(int));
00203     return m;
00204 }

00206 obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, double& i)
00207 {
00208     i = *(double*)m.raw_bytes(sizeof(double));
00209     return m;

00212 obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, float& i)

00214     i = *(float*)m.raw_bytes(sizeof(float));
00215     return m;

00218 obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, char& c)
00219 {
00220     c = m.raw_byte();
00221     return m;

00224 template <class T>
00225 obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, T*& p)
00226 {
00227     p = new T;
00228     return m >> (*p);
00229 }
00230 
00231 template <class T>
00232 obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, vector<T>& v)
00233 {
00234     size_t size;
00235     m >> size;
00236     v.resize(size);
00237     for (typename vector<T>::iterator it = v.begin(); it != v.end(); ++it) {
00238         m >> *it;
00239     }
00240     return m;
00241 }
00242 
00243 template <class T>
00244 obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, set<T>& v)
00245 {
00246     size_t size;
00247     m >> size;
00248     for (size_t i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00249         T tmp;
00250         m >> tmp;
00251         v.insert(v.end(), tmp);
00252     }
00253     return m;
00254 }
00255 
00256 obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, string& str)
00257 {
00258     size_t length;
00259     m >> length;
00260     str.clear();
00261     char* data = (char*)m.raw_bytes(length);
00262     str.append(data, length);
00263     return m;
00264 }

00266 template <class KeyT, class ValT>
00267 obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, pair<KeyT, ValT>& v)
00268 {
00269     m >> v.first;
00270     m >> v.second;
00271     return m;
00272 }

00274 template <class KeyT, class ValT>
00275 obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, map<KeyT, ValT>& v)
00276 {
00277     size_t size;
00278     m >> size;
00279     for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00280         KeyT key;
00281         m >> key;
00282         m >> v[key];
00283     }
00284     return m;
00285 }
00286 template <class KeyT, class ValT>
00287 obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, hash_map<KeyT, ValT>& v)
00288 {
00289     size_t size;
00290     m >> size;
00291     for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00292         KeyT key;
00293         m >> key;
00294         m >> v[key];
00295     }
00296     return m;
00297 }

00299 template <class T>
00300 obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, hash_set<T>& v)
00301 {
00302     size_t size;
00303     m >> size;
00304     for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00305         T key;
00306         m >> key;
00307         v.insert(key);
00308     }
00309     return m;
00310 }
